text: Shinagawa Takahisa (品川 高久, 1576 - September 1, 1639) was a Japanese samurai of the early Edo period, who served the Tokugawa clan. He was a hatamoto, and the son of Imagawa Ujizane. ==Ancestry== Category:1576 births Category:1639 deaths Category:Imagawa clan Category:Samurai Category:Hatamoto
title: Shinagawa Takahisa
